item.description:
IMPORTANT:

Whether or not you can get into the gallery opening is TOTALLY up to the gallery.   

Everyone needs to contact the gallery to put themselves on the guest list.  If you aren't on the guest list, they might or might not let you in.  Saying on the Meetup page that you are coming doesn't get you on the list.
item.why:
Because his work is amazing. I went last year and had a great time. I'm iffy myself due to a possible conflict, but wanted to share this with the group.
http://www.axelle.com/events/mdbos2011/index.html

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Gallery opening for Michel Delacroix
